Package com.example.courseanalyzer.service

Interface CourseAnalyzerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCourseCheckerService
    public interface CourseAnalyzerService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CourseReport compareCourses()  
      void readCertificateList​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Reads the request and extracts the certificates from the request which contains the uploaded file.
      void readStudyPlan​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Reads the request and extracts the mandatory courses, modules and transferable skills from the request which contains the uploaded file.
      void readTransitionalProvision​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Reads the request and extracts the additional mandatory courses from the request which contains the uploaded file.

    • Method Detail

      • readStudyPlan

        void readStudyPlan​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Reads the request and extracts the mandatory courses, modules and transferable skills from the request which contains the uploaded file.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the courses
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is thrown, when one necessary parameters is null.
        WrongFormatException - is thrown, when the format of table of content, text of mandatory courses, text of modules or text of the transferable skills is wrong.

      • readTransitionalProvision

        void readTransitionalProvision​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Reads the request and extracts the additional mandatory courses from the request which contains the uploaded file.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the courses
        Throws:
        ReadFileException - is thrown, when an IO problem occurs while reading the passed file.
        WrongFormatException - is thrown, when the text on a page is empty or the format creates an empty TransitionalProvision

      • readCertificateList

        void readCertificateList​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Reads the request and extracts the certificates from the request which contains the uploaded file.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the certificates
        Throws:
        ReadFileException - is thrown, when an IO problem occurs while reading the passed file.
        WrongFormatException - is thrown, when the format is empty or the text creates an empty list of certificates.

      • compareCourses

        CourseReport compareCourses()
        Returns:
        a report of the finished mandatory courses.
        See Also:
        CourseAnalyzer.compareCourses()
